name: Psychoduck
description:
Psychoduck is a stealth game about a psychotic duck who collects crowns and has no problem killing all herons in order to increase his collection.

Venture through 50 levels using all possible means to get all the crowns.

  • Amazing and colorful scenario!

  • 50 challenging and addictive stages to play with cutes characters.

  • You can play in the keyboard and in the joystick. Wherever you think is better.
  • Hitch a ride on alligators to get to some destinations. Feed Turtles and collect all the snails.

  • Create and execute the best plans and don't let the frog soldiers capture you. Use the slingshot to get them out of your way.

  • Be stealthy! Hide in brushes and avoid being caught!

Get all the crowns and... kill all herons!
